item.title: Morse Image Reading
item.description: Morse OCR linkmorse-ocr is an useful Python script to read and translate morse code from picture. python3 mocr.py example.png

item.title: Image File Reparing
item.description: Dump Hex from an Image linkWe can edit the image Hex header to repair the corrupted image to the correct format. To do that, check the hex header at first. xxd example.jpg | head xxd example.png | head Edit Hex to Adding Magic Bytes linkWe might be able to repair a corrupted image by inserting magic bytes for each file format. We can use hexedit or ghex to edit hex manually other than the following techniques.
